title: Hi Riot Games
body: I have not received  the Riot Kayle.Can i get this, or another skin?

replies.body: The gifts are on the way, friend!  Just give it a bit more time, as there are a lot of accounts that we are sending gifts out to.  Bookmark our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for updates, and hang tight until this is all done!
